column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Van Gogh.  Renoir.  Rodin.  Monet.  Manet.  Bouguereau.  Frank Lloyd Wright. That pointillism piece about Sunday something in the park.  Ancient Chinese and Indian art. Picasso. Degas. O'Keefe.  Modern photography.  Soviet chairs and propaganda pamphlets and communist anthems. Warhol. Plato. Socrates.  One million square feet.
